message: You're in luck! I have a rare opportunity to acquire a top-of-the-line product, and I'm willing to part with it for a mere $1000000. It's a steal! I've sold many products in the past, and I'm confident that this one will exceed your expectations. Don't miss out on this chance to own a premium item at an unbeatable price. Will you take the plunge and make an offer?
I'll take the product, but I'll only pay if it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll pass.
